column2:
```r
library(mgcv)
library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())


apixaban.data = read_csv('ApixibanExperimentData.csv')
```

Parsed with column specification:
cols(
  Time = col_double(),
  Subject = col_integer(),
  Concentration = col_double(),
  Group = col_character(),
  Sex = col_character()
)

```r
apixaban.data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Time, Concentration))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_grid(Sex ~ Group)
```
